name: Local Chess
description:
Play the game of kings and challenge the computer or your friends on the same device with our free chess application! Select your preferred mode and choose from several classy designs to personalize your table and pieces.

It doesn't matter if you are a beginner or an expert - six different difficulty levels make it easy to find the perfect difficulty that matches your skills. From chess beginner to chess pro. It is easy to learn chess with our app. It is a classic board game for the whole family.

If you need more help, simply activate the hint mode which will highlight all possible moves for the selected game piece.

Get ready to train your brain and play classic chess strategy for FREE now!

Reflexes:

- 2 different modes: play one player or two chess players

- 5 classy board layouts and tile sets available to customize your game

- Track mode available showing all possible moves

- Fully responsive, the game can be played in landscape or portrait mode

- All major devices supported

- FREE chess
